channel.title: Talks By Joe J. Christensen
channel.description: General Conference talks by Joe J. Christensen.

image.title: General Conference talks by Joe J. Christensen.

item.title: Good Memories Are Real Blessings
item.description: Brethren, it’s a marvelous privilege to be with you this evening. I’ve appreciated so much the messages that we have heard.

item.title: Rearing Children in a Polluted Environment
item.description: Not long ago, I had an impromptu conversation with a group of young parents who exhibited a great deal of anxiety about rearing their children in our morally polluted environment. They asked for assistance in helping their children find their way in

item.title: Marriage and the Great Plan of Happiness
item.description: Barbara and I have been blessed with six children. Some years ago, when we had taken all of them to visit with their grandparents, my father said, “Joe, I think you and Barbara have started something you can’t stop.”

item.title: The Savior Is Counting on You
item.description: A few years ago following general conference, our four-year-old grandson Andrew asked his mother, “Mommy, is Jesus counting on me?” His mother answered, “Oh yes, Andrew, Jesus counting on you. He wants you to obey Mom and Dad, to do what is right, a

item.title: Greed, Selfishness, and Overindulgence
item.description: I am confident that we will literally be called upon to make an accounting before God concerning how we have used [our resources] to bless lives and build the kingdom.
